original_text: And they found among the inhabitants of Jabesh-gilead 400 young virgins who had not known a man by lying with him, and they brought them to the camp at Shiloh, which is in the land of Canaan.
korean_text: 그들이 야베스 길르앗 주민 중에서 젊은 처녀 사백 명을 얻었으니 이는 아직 남자와 동침한 일이 없어 남자를 알지 못하는 자라 그들을 실로 진영으로 데려오니 이 곳은 가나안 땅이더라

sentences.original_text: who had not known a man by lying with him
sentences.korean_translation: 남자와 동침해 본 적이 없는 자들이었는데

sentences.original_text: and they brought them to the camp at Shiloh
which is in the land of Canaan
